What causes delay in germination of seeds?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

Unavailability of water and O2

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1833"},{"text":"

Impermeability of seed coat

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1834"},{"text":"

Mechanical resistance of testa

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1844"},{"text":"

All of these
